Title: Being John Malkovich
Overview: One day at work, unsuccessful puppeteer Craig finds a portal into the head of actor John Malkovich. The portal soon becomes a passion for anybody who enters its mad and controlling world of overtaking another human body.
Tagline: Ever wanted to be someone else? Now you can.
Keywords: individual, transvestism, sexual identity, witch, identity, subconsciousness, new identity, pet, chimp, puppeteer, appropriation of another human being, externally controlled action, married couple, brain, pet shop, door, secret love
production_companies: Gramercy Pictures, Propaganda Films, Single Cell Pictures
Cast: John Cusack, Cameron Diaz, Catherine Keener
